main.name: Gene Duncan
main.description: I am a Full Stack Software Developer based in Pinehurst, North Carolina
main.bio: I'm Gene Duncan, a Full Stack Developer. I am currently attending the Coding Bootcamp through UNC Chapel Hill. I hope to use these skills to launch a new career in Software/Web Development. My ideal job would involve remote work with flexible office work available. Immediately after this course I plan to pursue freelance opportunities until I am able to land a full-time Developer job. The main goal of freelancing will be to reinforce my coding skills. I expect to also learn new coding languages and gain real-world experience along the way. A few years down the line I hope to be progressing in the field and, eventually, I would like to launch my own startup building useful applications for both business and entertainment purposes.
main.contactmessage: Reach out! Send me an email, I will review your inquiry and get back to you.

resume.skillmessage: JavaScript, jQuery, NodeJS, React, HTML 5, CSS 3, MySQL, MongoDB, Bootstrap, Git, Heroku, Webpack, Express, Handlebars, Sequelize, NPM

education.school: Univeristy of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
education.degree: Certificate in Full Stack Web Development
education.description: MERN stack and various other tools and technologies.
